items.sentence: When Tom was a child, he went to Boston three times.
Why do I always have to do all the work around here?
To call this kitten cute would be an understatement.
Tom played with the food on his plate with his fork.
Tom poured a glass of orange juice from the pitcher.
I don\'t think that Tom knows who Mary\'s father is.
Why don\'t you give your seat to that old gentleman?
Why don\'t you take a seat and tell me all about it?
I grew up in Boston, but my wife comes from Chicago.
At the time, I thought it was the right thing to do.
